title: 48 books on the World, Imperialism, Revolution, etc.
description:
48 books on the World, Imperialism, and Revolution 


Authors: multiple



Description:



This is a collection of books dealing with imperialism (America and Europe), revolutions, counterrevolutions, underdevelopment, poverty, oppression Marxism/socialism, and capitalism in the Western and Eastern Hemispheres from 1492-2000.

Please don't accuse me of being bias towards Western capitalist/imperialist (America and Europe): they have been ruling the earth since 1492 to the present with some exceptions for the Ottoman empire in the Middle East until 1918.

Unfortunately, I have not included any books on the Islamic empire (started late 7th cent.) that stretched from West Africa to India (or as far as the Philippines); nor have I included any books on the rising imperialist dragon in the east, China. But maybe someone else will provide them!

Enjoy, and remember: "A little knowledge [with action] is a dangerous thing".


Book list: 


1. The Cold War and Its Origins (1961), 2 vols.

2. 1492 - What is it Like to be Discovered (1991)

3. Africa Must Unite (1963)

4. Agribusiness in the Americas (1980)

5. Anarchism - From Theory to Practice (1970)

6. Armed Struggle in Africa (1969)

7. Black Skin, White Masks (1967)

8. British Trade and the Opening of China, 1800-42 (1951)

9. Capitalism and Underdevelopment in Latin America (1969)

10. Capitalism Yesterday and Today (1962)

11. China Shakes the World (1949)

12. Class struggle in Africa (1970)

13. Debt and Disorder (1990)

14. Discourse on Colonialism (2000)

15. Empire & Commerce in Africa (1920)

16. Four Lectures on Marxism(1981)

17. Hungry for Profit (2000)

18. Imperialism (1979)

19. Imperialism and Underdevelopment (1970)

20. Imperialism and Unequal Development (1977)

21. Lessons from the Damned (1973)

22. Marx and Modern Economics (1968)

23. Marxism and Imperialism (1974)

24. Merchants of Death (1934)

25. Revolution in Central America (1984)

26. Revolution in Guinea (1970)

27. Revolutionary Path (1973)

28. Socialism (1949)

29. Soviet Education Today (1959)

30. Studies in Socialist Pedagogy (1978)

31. The Age of Imperialism (1969)

32. The Arab World and Israel (1970)

33. The Crisis in South Africa (1986)

34. The Critique of Capitalist Democracy (1957)

35. The Dominican Republic (1972)

36. The Grand Chessboard (1998)

37. The Hidden History of the Korean War (1988)

38. The Longer View (1969)

39. The Political Economy of Growth (1957)

40. The Politics of Intervention (1984)

41. The Sandinista Revolution (1986)

42. The Second Revolution in Cuba (1963)

43. The Struggle for Africa: Conflict of the Great Powers (1982)

44. The World the Dollar Built (1952)

45. Theory of Capitalistic Development

46. Thomas Sankara Speaks (1988)

47. Walls and Bars (1927)


Note(s):

The quality of the books are fairly high with the exception of two: "Discourse on Colonialism" has quite a few markings and "The Hidden History of the Korean War" scan is not the best.
